text:
Hi peter 
Wow that is amazing even if you didn’t make much money from it, it is nice to have a passion which i am still trying to find.
Can you talk more about your experience when you wrote a short film which aired on bbc???how did you get those links?? How  did you turn the story into a movie? If you don’t mind me asking how much did get paid for writing the story? Did you think of making a movie or it just happened because you had friends who helped you to air it on bbc??
Where were you selling your books? And why on that platform?
What do you mean by ‘ I published myself ‘ ???
I really want to start a business but I don’t know how to, any advices??

Thanks
Smarth
